Reviews.Title: all good
Reviews.Author: rld
Reviews.Content: A good product, and a good price, prompt delivery- what else do you need. the T60 is well built with a good screen and good software

Reviews.Title: Wireless card is missing
Reviews.Author: NYCTechie
Reviews.Content: "Trying to help out my school, I ordered this laptop recently. The good? It arrived 3 days sooner, it's not installed with garbage software, the hardware feels good and strong. The bad? Spent 4 hours of my life only to find out it doesn't have an internal wireless card. So I had to spend more $ to order an internal wireless card and install it myself - no biggie, but i have to wait a week to use it"
